course_title: History of Drama and Theater II
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 20 / Seats Avail: 20Waitlist Total: 0 of 6
course_description: A history of the theater from the eighteenth century through the twentieth century, focusing on representative dramatic works and on the actor, staging, and audience as they have influenced the development of drama and the theater in the modern period. May be taken without Theater 215. Required for theater studies majors.
sections: Class Nbr: 4355, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 2:30-3:45p, Instructor: N. Fesette, Status: Open
